MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L21 and L30  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Bowland Drive, Dale Acre Drive, Dartmouth Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:00AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:00AM on 15th January 2021.
